title: Energy System Data Modeling: Secure Collaborative Learning Based on Swarm Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational machine learning and distributed systems understanding, along with basic knowledge of energy systems
context.additional_context: Experiencing real energy data modeling in simulation environments while emphasizing data security and privacy protection through blockchain-based distributed collaborative learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core components of swarm learning architecture (blockchain, smart contracts, consensus mechanisms).
Learners can implement distributed machine learning model training processes in simulated environments using simulation tools.
Learners can present project results applying swarm learning to energy system data (photovoltaic forecasting/geological exploration data) according to evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
